entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
